snippet: Brandon Dubinsky had a goal and an assist in his return to the lineup after a concussion, and the injury-riddled Columbus Blue Jackets ended a seven-game losing streak with a 3-2 victory over the host Devils.
abstract: Columbus Blue Jackets defeat New Jersey Devils, 3-2; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brandon Dubinsky had a goal and an assist in his return to the lineup after a concussion, and the injury-riddled Columbus Blue Jackets ended a seven-game losing streak with a 3-2 victory over the host Devils.
